name: Coco' Inexplicable Escapades
description:
A side-scrolling platformer game with 9 stages

Has a 50MB size so it might take a while to load

Controls:

Movement: A & D

Jump: Space

Dash: Shift

Attack: J

Evaluate  the game here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSetIZ_d0Jw8JEbsUI4bPsrvVTcIJHUrBOMZXzrQ...
